This allows you to easily show or hide birthdays and keep your main calendar clean and organized.

help.title: How does it work?
help.intro: This app is designed to help you track birthdays - Hebrew and Gregorian - easily and effortlessly. Here's what you can do:
help.step1_desc: Click the plus (+) button, enter a name and Gregorian birth date, and we automatically calculate the Hebrew date and age. You can also import a full list at once from an Excel/CSV file.
help.step2_desc: For each person, you can choose whether to celebrate on the Hebrew date, Gregorian date, or both! The system will always show you the next upcoming birthday.
help.step3_desc: With one click, all birthdays will appear in your Google Calendar, so you get reminders just the way you're used to.
help.step4_desc: You can organize people into groups (Family, Work Friends, Class 5B) and easily filter the list to find exactly who you're looking for.
help.footer: Simple, smart, and organized. Enjoy! ðŸŽ‰

footer.deleteAccountNotImplemented: Account deletion functionality is not yet available. Please contact support.

gelt.title: Hanukkah/Purim Money
gelt.description: Calculate Hanukkah/Purim money budget by age groups
gelt.howItWorksContent:
The system allows you to calculate your Hanukkah/Purim money budget in a smart and organized way:

1. Import Children - Import children from the birthday list or add manually
2. Set Age Groups - Define age groups and amount per group
3. Set Budget - Set number of participants and allowed overflow percentage, or enter a custom budget
4. Automatic Calculation - The system calculates the required amount for each group and each child
5. Save Budget Profiles - Save settings for reuse

Budget Profiles:
â€¢ Each profile saves age groups, budget settings, and custom settings (if any)
â€¢ Important: The birthday list is not saved in the profile - only the settings are saved
â€¢ If the birthday list changes, the profile remains and distributes the same way even when the list grows
â€¢ You can save up to 10 different budget profiles
â€¢ Set one profile as default to load automatically
â€¢ Load a saved profile to quickly apply settings

The system automatically calculates the optimal distribution of the budget among groups while maintaining multiples of 5 ILS.
gelt.showExcluded: Show {{count}} records without relevant age group
gelt.excludedAgesWarningDescription: {{count}} records with ages that don't have a relevant age group will not be included in the budget calculation
gelt.customBudgetHint: Budget will be automatically distributed by relative percentages of each group
gelt.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset all data?
gelt.profileNameTooLong: Profile name is too long (maximum {{max}} characters)
gelt.profileNameDuplicate: This profile name already exists. Please choose a different name
gelt.profileMaxCountReached: You have reached the maximum number of budget profiles ({{max}}). Delete an existing profile to create a new one
gelt.systemDefaultProfileDescription: System default settings - basic age groups and budget settings
gelt.confirmDeleteProfile: Are you sure you want to delete the profile '{{name}}'?
gelt.confirmRemoveChild: Are you sure you want to remove this child from the list?
gelt.modifiedAgesWarningDescription: Manually modified ages will not be saved after refresh. Ages will automatically reset to the original age from birthdays.

terms.title: Terms of Use for "hebbirthday"
terms.intro: Welcome to "hebbirthday" (the "Application" or "Service"). Use of the Application, its services, and its content is subject to the terms detailed below ("Terms of Use"). Please read them carefully. Your use of the Application, in any manner, constitutes your unconditional agreement to these terms. If you do not agree to the Terms of Use, in whole or in part, you may not use the Application.

section1.title: 1. Definition of the Service
section1.content: The Application provides a platform for managing, centralizing, and tracking birthdays. The Service allows users to create closed "Organizations" (Tenants), input birthday details (including Gregorian date, Hebrew date, gender, and "after sunset" status), and manage records in a collaborative environment based on permissions (Owner, Admin, Member). The Application includes automatic calculation of Hebrew dates and an option to sync with the user's personal Google Calendar.

section2.title: 2. Legal Capacity and Age of Use
section2.content: Use of the Application is permitted only for users who are over 18 years of age and have full legal capacity to enter into this agreement. By using the Application, you declare and confirm that you meet these age and capacity requirements.

section3.title: 3. User Accounts
section3.content: Use of the Application requires registration and creation of an account via an email address and password or through third-party authentication services (such as Google). You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login details and for all activity that occurs under your account. Each user is associated with one or more "Organizations" (Tenants) and operates according to the permissions defined for them in that organization.

section4.title: 4. Intellectual Property
section4.content1: All intellectual property rights in the Application, including source code, design, logo, graphic interface, and any other material contained therein (excluding User-Generated Content), belong exclusively to the application's developer, Chagai Yechiel. You may not copy, reproduce, distribute, modify, or make any commercial use of the Application or any part of it without express written permission. Icons used in the application are from the lucide-react library under the ISC license.
section4.content2: You are solely responsible for the content you create and upload to the Application, including names, dates, notes, and any other personal information.
section4.content3: The Application allows you to enter personal information about other people (the birthday subjects). By uploading this content, you represent and warrant that you have obtained all necessary legal consents from those third parties (or their legal guardians) for the collection, storage, and processing of their information within the Service.

section5.title: 5. Proper Use, Content Removal, and Service Termination
section5.content: You undertake not to upload any content that is illegal, offensive, threatening, racist, defamatory, or violates privacy. The application developer reserves the right, at his sole discretion, to immediately remove any content that violates these terms, and to block or suspend a user's access to the service, without prior notice.

section6.title: 6. Changes, Updates, and Discontinuation of Service
section6.content: The application developer reserves the full right, at his sole discretion, to change the Application and its features at any time, including adding, removing, or modifying functionality, without prior notice. You agree that you shall have no claim or demand against the developer for making such changes. These Terms of Use will apply to any updated version. Reasonable notice will be given for material changes to the Terms of Use. Your continued use of the Application after an update will constitute acceptance of the updated terms. The developer also reserves the right to discontinue the Application's activity, in whole or in part.

section7.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
section7.content1: The Application is provided for use "as is," without any warranty, express or implied, as to its correctness, availability, or reliability.
section7.content2: The application developer is not responsible for the content uploaded by users, including the accuracy of the information entered or the acquisition of necessary consents for its entry.
section7.content3: The Application provides tools for calculating Hebrew dates. This functionality depends on third-party services (such as Hebcal API). The application developer is not responsible for the accuracy of calculations, errors, or failures arising from these third-party services. Likewise, synchronization with external calendars (such as Google Calendar) is offered "as is" and is not guaranteed to be error-free. The responsibility for verifying the correctness of dates and events rests solely with the user.

section8.title: 8. Jurisdiction
section8.content: These Terms of Use shall be governed by the laws of the State of Israel. The competent courts in the Tel Aviv-Jaffa district shall have exclusive jurisdiction in any dispute.

section9.title: 9. Contact
section9.content: For any questions regarding these Terms of Use, you can contact us via email at:
